briefdescription.para: Period complete callback for PWM channels.
Fault callback for PWM error handling.
Configure LED channel with fade support.
Configure motor channels with complementary outputs.
Comprehensive example demonstrating all advanced features of the refactored EspPwm implementation.

detaileddescription.para:
This example showcases:
Multi-variant ESP32 support
Unit configuration with different modes
Hardware fade functionality
Complementary outputs for motor control
Statistics and diagnostics monitoring
Advanced timer management
Interrupt-driven callbacks
Error handling and recovery
